alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range; North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 1:41AM MST until January 08 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one to three inches. Locally higher amounts possible near the high terrain. * WHERE...Converse County Lower Elevations, North Laramie Range and North Snowy Range Foothills. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Hazardous travel conditions due to areas of snow and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range; North Snowy Range Foothills
